Chandak is an ideal spot for hang gliding too..',image:"https://cdn.s3waas.gov.in/s347d1e990583c9c67424d369f3414728e/uploads/bfi_thumb/2019081726-olw8lu4dfgr9v8jcich4uptocharpz6yuc44olv9fu.jpg"},{id:2,title:'Thal Kedar Temple',label:'Famous for a revered temple dedicated to Lord Shiva, Thal Kedar finds mention in the Skanda Purana, an ancient Hindu religious text. Though the main structure is almost in ruins, it does offer a fun hike.
